name: Roll Together
description:
Roll Together was created during the createChester game jam of 2018.

Theme - Community.

Roll Together is a team based game, that requires you to work together to get the team ball into the goal hole, while avoiding the traps with your personal ball.

 

Requirements to play:

2-4 Xbox 360/Xbox One controllers.

How to play:

Each player is given a Colour. The team ball has a timer above it which also shows the  colour of the player currently controlling the ball. 

Work as a team to get the team ball into the goal hole.

Left Stick to move the ball. 

Created by:

Programming

  • Callum Nathan-Jones
  • Matthew Davies
  • Emilia Lyon

  • Niamh O'Halloran
